metadata.title: Indian Village Woman Cooking कैर सांगरी Food on brick Stove - Marwari Rajasthani Life
metadata.description: This video shows how to make Ker Sangri, a traditional Rajasthani desert food cooked by a village woman using a brick stove and primitive cooking methods in Ajmer, Rajasthan.

transcription_hindi: [00:00:00.000] राजस्थान में सब्ज़ियों और पानी की कमी के कारण यहां का खाना थोड़ा अलग होता है।
[00:00:06.000] यहां के राजा और योद्धा शिकार पर जाते थे, जिससे ऐसे खाद्य पदार्थ बने जो कई दिनों तक टिक सकें।
[00:00:17.000] कैर सांगरी उन्हीं में से एक है, जिसे कम पानी में तेल और मसालों से पकाया जाता है।
[00:00:27.000] आइए देखते हैं यह खास कैर सांगरी कैसे बनाई जाती है।
[00:02:47.000] हमारे गांव में गोगाजी, तेजाजी और रामदेवजी के अलग-अलग मंदिर हैं।
[00:09:31.000] कमेंट करें, लाइक करें और चैनल को सब्सक्राइब करें।
transcription_english: [00:00:00.000] Due to the scarcity of vegetables and water, Rajasthani food is quite different.
[00:00:06.000] The hunting traditions of kings and warriors led to foods that could last for many days.
[00:00:17.000] Ker Sangri is one such dish, cooked with oil and spices using very little water.
[00:00:23.000] It is eaten with bajra (millet) roti.
[00:00:27.000] Let’s see how this unique Ker Sangri is prepared.
[00:01:20.000] In villages, it is called ‘Bera’.
[00:01:42.000] In cities, it is called a well.
[00:01:45.000] In villages, it is known as Bera.
[00:01:57.000] In villages, vegetables are also referred to as Bera.
[00:02:10.000] The village name is Chinikala.
[00:02:16.000] Many peacocks come near the well there.
[00:02:47.000] In our village, there are temples of Gogaji, Tejaji, and Ramdevji.
[00:03:00.000] There is a temple of Tejaji Maharaj in Surasura.
[00:03:16.000] I was born there.
[00:03:29.000] Ramdevji’s place is Ramdevra.
[00:03:39.000] There is a village vegetable called Kaisangri.
[00:03:55.000] This vegetable is prepared without much chilli.
[00:04:13.000] It has a light reddish color.
[00:04:59.000] This is the famous village Pitor vegetable.
[00:05:06.000] It is called Gatta.
[00:05:10.000] Gattas are made from gram flour.
[00:05:15.000] They are cut into pieces and added to the curry.
[00:05:41.000] It can be made wet or dry.
[00:06:04.000] It is eaten with bajra roti.
[00:06:29.000] The vegetable is ready.
[00:07:43.000] Now the dough is kneaded.
[00:08:12.000] The grains and husk are separated.
[00:08:29.000] I am a government employee.
[00:08:53.000] Yes, now it is ready.
[00:09:14.000] People eat the roti and leave.
[00:09:28.000] How did you like this video?
[00:09:31.000] Please comment, like, and subscribe to the channel.
